articles.author: Winnie Hsu, Ruth Carson
articles.title: Asian Stocks Look Subdued Ahead of Jackson Hole: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg
articles.description: Financial markets moved in narrow ranges, with global equities holding near record highs, after Donald Trump’s meeting with Ukraine’s president and European leaders ended with a call for a summit with Russia.
